mapper.select: select id, `name`, username, `password`, phone, sex, id_number, `status`, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user from employee where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into employee(`name`, username, `password`, phone, sex, id_number, `status`, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
